contractName: A Boy and His Trashcan III
shortDescription: Soon as we get him out of there, We will need to escort him to the dropship, he gets lost easy. My poor, poor trashy friend.

contractObjectiveList.title: Escort the Urban Mechs to the local government pick up point
contractObjectiveList.description: Capture Convoy Rally Point and Escort Convoy to Safety

objectiveList.title: Eliminate the Roadblock
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the force of enemies which will try an stop the player from reaching the rally point.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy enemy units which will attempt to block the convoy from reaching its destination.

objectiveList.title: Escort the mechs to the Pickup site
objectiveList.description: Escort Friendly units to their Destination

objectiveList.title: Ensure that All the mechs Survive
objectiveList.description: Protect the all units in Convoy during Extraction, suffering no losses.

objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Hunter Lance for Mission Completion
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy hunter lance for mission complete.

objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone
objectiveList.description: The objective to escape with all the player units.

objectiveList.title: Protect the Convoy Until the DropShip Arrives
Protect the Convoy As It Boards the DropShip

dialogueContent.words: Lets get in there and find him. I hope his transistors are in one piece.
He is really gung ho about finding his friend. Wait Transistors?
Yeah the things that do the thinking. You know, Transistors.
Well I know why his friend was captured now. Do you think that what we are looking for is an Urbanmech?
I heard someone say Just leave that trashcan here, so I figured they didn't want him. So I made him wake up. We were having a great time till they freaked out, shot him and dragged him away.
Yeah, Trashy is back. Thank you Commander.
Not a problem.
One Problem. Doesn't look like they are going to let him go easy. Can I ask you to help defend us one last time?
No! You Monsters!!!
I will get my revenge!
Just you wait!
Commander. The enemy had deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
Damn it! We've got more enemies coming in fast!
If they hurt Trashy Again, I will be really pissed.
You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
There are four of them here, Quick lets get all back to the dropship. Ill figure out which one is Trashy there.
It seems they were trying to copy my work. Well more friends to play with!
Well, I would never have expected to see self driving Trashcans!
It's like I have a family
The drones are safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.
